alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 20 at 1:21PM PDT until May 21 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Low temperatures of 33 to 36 will result in frost formation. Isolated pockets of temperatures below freezing are possible. * WHERE...In California, Western Siskiyou County and Central Siskiyou County. This includes the Shasta, Scott valleys, and portions of the Klamath valley. In Oregon, Josephine County and Jackson County. This includes the Rogue, Illinois, and Applegate valleys. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
